scripts.say: Phew... We all made it in one piece...
That you did. Job well done getting those ships back to port.
Memphis? I thought you were preparing for a meeting?
Among other things... I've got goods to relocate, strategic documents to draft, and messages to relay... Basically, up to my neck in paperwork.
Note to self: never tempt fate again by telling people about your weekend vacation plans... Oh, did I say that out loud?
Sounds stressful. Wouldn't want to be in your shoes...
Have to get through it somehow. Anyway, you three are going to group up with Cleveland's fleet and head out on a mission, right?
Eyup! Groupin' up and headin' out, that's the plan!
What she said. Why do you ask? Did something happen?
Actually, yes: your AO has changed. The higher-ups have ordered you to go on a special mission instead.
A special mission...?
I've already informed the Commander about it, so consider that done.
Here, this mission briefing outlines your orders. Read it later when you have time.
The mission is in Siren-occupied waters, so prepare yourselves accordingly. If you need to, contact me by radio...
Gotta say, I'm really impressed by your dedication today.
Dedication? That's just the coffee doing the talking...
Either that, or all this paperwork is driving me crazy and I'm just ecstatic to catch a break from it. Dunno really.
Anyway... that should be everything you need to know. Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to move on to the next task at hand.
Thanks, Memphis. Hope your work goes well.
Let's see... Recon mission in an AO with a STAR rating of 4... Interesting...
All right, everyone. Inspect your gear and restock on supplies and ammo. Soon as everyone's done, we'll sortie.
Gotcha, Enty! I'll just need to find a gift for Cleve real quick!
There's that gift shop we went by earlier. Might be worth a look...
Heh heh heh... Let's hope you have a "pleasant" voyage...
